channel.title: Item Assistant

item.title: Item Assistant
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:2, topic:389236”] if(itemName.contains("zamorak")) { if(itemName.contains("platebody") && !itemName.contains("platelegs")) { c.defenceLevelReq = 40; } return; }
Your code is asking.

If item contains the name Zamorak then if the item contains the name platebody AND NOT platelegs require the defense level of 40.

Take a look at your code

Means AND

You need

which means OR

you also are using

! = NOT operator.[/quote]

I should have told him that on msn… im so stupid

EDIT : Also do make it so its with platebody platelegs and kiteshield also, with full helm, making it extreme a rare.

if(itemName.contains("zamorak")) { if(itemName.contains("platebody") && !itemName.contains("platelegs") && !itemName.contains("kiteshield")) { c.defenceLevelReq = 40; } return; }

Read full topic

item.title: Item Assistant
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

if(itemName.contains("zamorak")) { if(itemName.contains("platebody") && !itemName.contains("platelegs")) { c.defenceLevelReq = 40; } return; }
Your code is asking.

If item contains the name Zamorak then if the item contains the name platebody AND NOT platelegs require the defense level of 40.

Take a look at your code

Means AND

You need

which means OR

you also are using

! = NOT operator.

item.title: Item Assistant
item.dc:creator: @pk2play pk2play
item.description:
@pk2play wrote:

Hey i was trying to make zamorak so that you must have 40 defence.
Here is part of my code

if(itemName.contains("zamorak")) { if(itemName.contains("platebody") && !itemName.contains("platelegs")) { c.defenceLevelReq = 40; } return; }
Is there anything wrong with it?
The platebody requires 40 def but the legs don’t.
Thanks

Read full topic
